definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: Ge 30:30 [[מעט אשׁר היה לך]] [[לְפָנַי]] the little that thou hadst, Ge 47:9 [[מעט ורעים היו]] [[ימי שׁני חיי]] few and evil, Le 25:52, Nu 26:54 (cf. Nu 33:54) [[וְלַמְעַט תמעיט נחלתו]] and to the small (few) thou shalt make small his inheritance, v:Nu 26:56, Nu 35:8 [[וּמֵאֵת הַֽמְעַט תמעיטו]], De 7:7 [[וכי אתם הַֽמְעַט מכל־]] [[העמים]] ye are the fewest out of all peoples, 1Sa 14:6 [[לְהוֹשִׁיעַ בְּרַב אוֹ בִמְעָָט]], Je 42:2 [[כִּי נִשְׁאַרְנוּ מְעַט מֵהַרְבֵּה]] we are left as few out of many, Ez Eze 5:3 [[וְלָקַחְתָּ מִשָּׁם]] [[מְעַט בְּמִסְפָּר]], Hag 1:6 [[זְרַעְתֶּם הַרְבֵּה וְהָבֵא מְעָָט]] (cf. v:Hag 1:9), Ps 8:6 [[ותחסּרהו מעט מאלהים]], Ps 37:16 [[טוֹב מְעַט לַצַּדִּיק]] (cf. Pr 15:16, Pr 16:8), 2Ch 29:34 [[רַק הַכּׂהֲנִים הָיוּ לִמְעָָט]]; as pred. Nu 13:18 [[הַמְעַט הוּא אִם־רָָב]], Jos 7:3 [[כִּי מְעַט]] [[הֵמָּה]], Job 10:20, Ru 2:7, Ne 7:4; Is 16:14 [[וּשְׁאָר מְעַט]] [[מִזְעָר]].—Ho 8:10 [[וַָיָּחֵלּוּ מְעַט]] and they begin as littleness ( = to be minished) because of, &c.; but rd. prob. (LXX) [[וְיֶחְדְּלוּ מְעַט מִמְּשׁׂחַ]] and they shall cease for a little (

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: as subst. with foll. gen., Ge 18:4 [[מְעַט מַיִם]] a little of water, Ge 24:17, Ge 24:43, [[מְעַט אׂכֶל]] Ge 43:2, Ge 44:25, 1Sa 14:43, 1Sa 17:28 [[מְעַט הַצּאׁן הָהֵ֫נׇּה]] lit. the fewness of those sheep, Pr 6:10 +; as gen. to a previous subst., [[מְתֵי מְעָָט]] men of fewness †De 26:5, De 28:62; in appos., † Is 10:7 [[לְהַכְרִית גּוֹיִם לאׁ מְעָָט]], Ezr 9:8 [[מִחְיׇה מְעַט]], Ne 2:12 [[וַאֲנׇשִׁים מְעַט עִמִּי]], Ec 9:4; either gen. or appos., Ec 10:1, Da 11:34 [[יֵעָֽזְרוּ עֵזֶר מְעָָט]] with a help of smallness.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: twice declined as an adj., Ps 109:8 [[יִהְיוּ יׇמָיו מְעַטִּים]], Ec 5:1 [[על־כן יהיו דבריך]] [[מְעַטִּים]].

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: as adverb. acc., of place, 2Sa 16:1 [[וְדָוִד עׂבֵר מְעַט]]; of time, Job 10:20 b; of degree, 2Ki 10:18 [[אַחְאָב עָבַד אֶת־הַבַּעַל מְעָָט]], Ez Eze 11:16 and have been to them for a sanctuary but little, Zec 1:15; repeated [[מְעַט מְעַט]] by little, by little = gradually, Ex 23:30, De 7:22.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: phrases:—a. with the interr. [[הֲ]], † Ge 30:15 [[הַֽמְעַט קַחְתֵּח אֶת־]] [[אִישִׁי וְלָקַחַת]] was thy taking my husband (too) little? and (wilt thou be) for taking also my son's love-apples? Nu 16:9–Nu 16:10 [[הַֽמְעַט מִכֶּם כִּי]] [[וּבִקַּשְׁתֶּם גַּם כְּהֻנׇּה]] …[[הִבְדִּיל ]] is it too little for you that J. hath separated, etc., ... and do ye seek, etc.? v:Nu 16:13 [[כִּי תִשְׂתָּרֵר גַּם הִשְׂתָּרֵר]] …[[הַֽמְעַט כִּי הֶעֱלִיתָנוּ ]], Jos 22:17 f. ´[[וְאַתֶּם תָּשׁוּבוּ וגו]] …[[הַֽמְעַט לָנוּ ]], Is 7:13 ´[[הַֽמְעַט מִכֶּם הַלְאוֹת אֲנׇשִׁים כִּי תַּלְאוּ וגו]] is wearying men too little for you, that you will weary also my God? Ez Eze 34:18 (as Ew Co AVRV), Job 15:11 [[הַֽמְעַט מִמְּ ְתַּנְחוּמוֹת אֵל]]. But Ez Eze 16:20 (si vera l.) was it (too) little because of thy whoredom? (was that insufficient for thee? Kö: iii. 406 m). b. ´[[עוֹד מְעַט וְ]], †Ex 17:4 [[עוֹד מְעַט וּסְקָלֻנִי]] yet a little, and they will stone me, Je 51:33, Ho 1:4, Ps 37:10; ´[[עוֹד מְעַט מִזְעָר וְ]] †Is 10:25, Is 29:17; cf. Hag 2:6, Job 24:24.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: within a little, almost (cf. o)li/gou), Ge 26:10 …[[כִּמְעַט שָׁכַב ]] almost had lain ..., Ps 73:2 Qr, Ps 94:17, Ps 119:87, Pr 5:14 (all sq. pf.); Ez Eze 16:47 [[כִּמְעַט קָט וַתַּשְׁחִתִי מֵהֶן]] like a little, and thou hadst done more corruptly than they; Ct So 3:4 [[כִּמְעַט שֶׁעָבַרְתִּי מֵהֶם]] = hardly had I passed.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: with impf., just, 2Sa 19:37 [[כמעט יעבר עבדך]] just would thy servant pass over; lightly, easily, quickly (cf. di) o)li/gou), Ps 2:12 [[כִּי יִבְעַר כִּמְעַט אַפּוֹ]], Ps 81:15, Job 32:22.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: = little worth, Pr 10:20 [[כמעט ולב רשׁעים]]. e. pleon. for [[מְעַט]], Is 1:9 (accents) [[כִּמְעָָט שָׂרִיר]] a little remnant, Ps 105:12 (= 1Ch 16:19) [[כִּמְעַט וְגָרִים בָּהּ]]; [[כִּמְעַט רֶגַע]] like the littleness of a moment = for a little moment, Is 26:20, Ezr 9:8.
